subject: Little League World Series
Profanity
Coaches and Managers
Little League
Baseball
lead_paragraph: During Staten Island’s 1-0 loss to Lemont, Ill., a player yelled an obscenity and the team’s manager appeared to respond by striking him.
snippet: During Staten Island’s 1-0 loss to Lemont, Ill., a player yelled an obscenity and the team’s manager appeared to respond by striking him.
